Every college student can agree that this is one of the most difficult periods in life PERIOD Between homework achieving good grades balancing relationships plus jobs and extracurriculars life gets stressful PERIOD All this stress can negatively impact your mental health PERIOD While suicide is an issue that is addressed yearround September is Suicide Prevention Awareness Month PERIOD

It is a time for those affected to share resources and stories to shed light on a highly taboo and stigmatized topic PERIOD The goal is to raise awareness and connect individuals with mental health conditions to proper treatment PERIOD It is a very important albeit gutwrenching and heartbreaking topic to bring to the forefront of discussion PERIOD

Suicidal thoughts typically stem from untreated mental health conditions PERIOD Anyone can be affected regardless of race gender age or background PERIOD According to the National Alliance on Mental Health  out of every  adults will face a mental health condition this year PERIOD According to the CDC suicide rates have increased by  percent since  PERIOD Annually around  people lose their lives to suicide PERIOD

Suicide Prevention Awareness Month presents the opportunity for many communities around the nation to hold events and raise awareness for the cause PERIOD MSU and the greater Bozeman community sponsor events during the month as well as throughout the fall PERIOD

On Saturday Sept PERIOD  Bozeman hosted the forth annual Out of the Darkness Community Walk sponsored by the American Foundation for Suicide Prevention PERIOD The walk raises money for suicide prevention education research and advocacy PERIOD Bozeman is also organizing the annual Run for Your Life 5K on Saturday Oct PERIOD  PERIOD The proceeds from the Halloweenthemed race benefit the Bozeman Help Center PERIOD Over the years the Bozeman community has raised  and supported those affected by suicide PERIOD

Additionally Counseling and Psychological Services at MSU is hosting five suicide prevention training courses this September and October PERIOD There will be a Sack Lunch Seminar put on by CPS on Wednesday Oct PERIOD  from  to  p.m PERIOD in SUB  PERIOD The professional staff at CPS provide free and confidential services including group and individual counseling services outreach and prevention plus consultation to students parents staff faculty and the Bozeman community PERIOD

According to the National Alliance on Mental Health everyone can benefit from honest conversations regarding mental health and suicide PERIOD If you or someone you know is struggling with thoughts of suicide know that there are many available resources and people who can help PERIOD
